metadata.title: President condoles death of Nayyer Hussain BokhariÃ¢ÂÂs wife

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 3 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Friday offered his heartfelt condolences to Secretary General Pakistan Peoples Party Parliamentarians Nayyer Hussain Bokhari over the death of his wife. Expressing deep grief and sorrow, the president conveyed his sympathies to Nayyer Hussain Bokhari and his family. In a press statement, President Zardari prayed for eternal peace to the departed soul and courage for the bereaved family to bear the loss with patience.
content.summary: President Asif Ali Zardari offered condolences to Nayyer Hussain Bokhari over the death of his wife. The President expressed his sympathies to Bokhari and his family. He prayed for the departed soul and courage for the bereaved family.
